children.label: Use Prepared Statement
children.info: Turning on Prepared Statement makes your queries resilient against bad things like SQL injections. However, it cannot be used if your dynamic binding contains any SQL keywords like 'SELECT', 'WHERE', 'AND', etc.

children.label: Timestamp Value Path (use dot(.) notation to reference nested key e.g. ["key1.key2"])

children.label: Run query on page load

children.info: Ask confirmation from the user each time before refreshing data

children.label: Smart BSON Substitution
children.info: Turning on this property fixes the BSON substitution of bindings in the Mongo BSON document by adding/removing quotes intelligently and reduces developer errors

children.label: Query timeout (in milliseconds)
children.info: Maximum time after which the query will return
